sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Move Agent Kit is a comprehensive toolkit designed to simplify AI agents' interactions with Move-based blockchains...

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content: Token Operations: Transfer tokens, mint new tokens, burn existing tokens...

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
### Using NPM
```bash
npm install move-agent-kit
```
### From Source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Metamove/move-agent-kit
cd move-agent-kit
npm i
```
